|--------- Vector 3d
| vector3d a 10 bits
| x=10 bits y=10 bits z=10 bits control=2bit

{{{
:>z
:>y 
:>x 
:>xyz | v -- x y z
:3d> | x y z -- v
}}}

| vector2d de 14 bits c/control
| x=14 bits	y=14 bits  control=4bits

{{{

:d>y | v -- y
:d>x | v -- x

:dxy |v1 v2 -- dx dy
}}}
